subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Knicks should realize Carmelo Anthony is not a great fit on a team that has Amar’e Stoudemire and do what is in their best interests to win a title: explore a trade.
snippet: The Knicks should realize Carmelo Anthony is not a great fit on a team that has Amar’e Stoudemire and do what is in their best interests to win a title: explore a trade.
